channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- OpenPages GRC Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- OpenPages GRC Platform

item.title: CVE-2016-0234|2024-09-16T16:27:59.787Z -- ibm -- openpages%20grc%20platform
item.description: IBM OpenPages GRC Platform 7.1, 7.2, and 7.3 could allow a local user to obtain sensitive information when a previous user has logged out of the system but neglected to close their browser. IBM X-Force ID: 110303.

item.title: CVE-2017-1679|2024-09-16T17:34:09.315Z -- ibm -- openpages%20grc%20platform
item.description: IBM OpenPages GRC Platform 7.2, 7.3, 7.4, and 8.0 could allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information from error log files. IBM X-Force ID: 134001.
